case_name: Yablonsky v. California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation, et al.

docket_entries.description:
CASE OPENED. A copy of your notice of appeal / petition filed in 3:18-cv-01122-AGS has been received in the Clerk's office of the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.
The U.S. Court of Appeals docket number 23-2435 has been assigned to this case. All communications with the court must indicate this Court of Appeals docket number. Please carefully review the docket to ensure the name(s) and contact information are correct.  It is your responsibility to alert the court if your contact information changes.
Resources Available
For more information about case processing and to assist you in preparing your brief, please review the Case Opening Information (for attorneys and pro se litigants) and review the Appellate Practice Guide. Counsel should consider contacting the court's Appellate Mentoring Program for help with the brief and argument. [Entered: 09/27/2023 03:30 PM]

docket_entries.description:
SCHEDULE NOTICE. Appeal No RT Opening Brief Due 11/24/2023, Appeal No RT Answering Brief Due 12/26/2023 . All briefs shall be served and filed pursuant to FRAP 31 and 9th Cir. R. 31-2.1.

Failure of the petitioner(s)/appellant(s) to comply with this briefing schedule will result in automatic dismissal of the appeal. See 9th Cir. R. 42-1. [Entered: 09/27/2023 03:33 PM]
